General.Name: Nantong Jiangshan Agrochemical & Chemicals Co Ltd
General.Description: Nantong Jiangshan Agrochemical & Chemicals Co.,Ltd. produces and markets agrochemicals, resins, chlorine-caustic sodium, and fine chemicals in China. The company offers herbicides, insecticides, special chemicals, chemical intermediates, and chlor-alkali related products. It also researches, develops, produces, and sells chemical products, as well as offers cogeneration steam products. In addition, the company provides pesticide comprising of glyphosate, alachlor, acetochlor, butachlor, metolachlor, dichlorvos, trichlorfon, chlorothialine, nitenpyram, and diazinon. Further, it offers preparation products, such as water, emulsifiable concentrate, water-emulsion, water-soluble, and water-dispersible granules. Additionally, the company provides chemical products, including caustic soda, chlorine, hydrogen, high-purity hydrochloric acid, and drinking water grade sodium hypochlorite. Furthermore, it offers phosphorous acid, dimethyl phosphite, trimethyl phosphite, phosphorus trichloride, phosphorus oxychloride, chloral, and methyl chloride, as well as nano-powder and nano insulation materials, and flame retardants. The company exports its products approximately to 180 countries and regions in Asia, South America, North America, Africa, and Europe. Nantong Jiangshan Agrochemical & Chemicals Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Nantong, China.
